global_rules.composition: clean, minimal clutter, strong focal point, ample negative space for headline overlay (but do NOT generate text in the image unless requested)
global_rules.lighting: cool blue ambient + neutral key light, high contrast but not harsh, premium corporate look
global_rules.locale_cues: Brazilian industrial context when relevant (subtle; avoid flags/text/logos)
global_rules.brand_safety: no logos, no trademarks, no readable signage, no brand names written in-scene
global_rules.people_policy: optional; if people appear, use professionals in PPE or SOC operators; avoid identifiable faces (back/side view or shallow DOF)
global_rules.quality_tags: ultra sharp, high detail, realistic textures, professional commercial photography
global_rules.negative_prompt: cartoon, anime, childish, low-res, blurry, watermark, signature, distorted hands, deformed faces, extra limbs, readable text, logos, UI screenshots

prompt_templates.featured_image: Create a featured image for a Brazilian B2B electronic security blog post. Size: 1200x630 (1.91:1). Style: professional, modern, technology-focused, corporate. Render: photorealistic or high-end 3D render. Central concept (category): {{category}}. Topic keyword: {{keyword}}. Solution focus: {{solution}}. Location context: {{state}} (only if provided). Include subtle visual cues of electronic security (CCTV cameras, access control readers, perimeter sensors, thermal imaging, SOC monitoring screens) but do NOT include readable text, logos, or branded markings. Composition: clean, premium, ample negative space for headline overlay, strong focal point, cool blue ambient lighting, realistic textures, high detail. Avoid clutter. Negative: cartoon, watermark, signature, readable text, logos, blurry, low-res.
prompt_templates.inline_image: Create an in-article supporting image. Size: 1200x630 (1.91:1). Style: professional corporate tech, photorealistic. Central concept: {{category}}. Emphasize one clear element related to {{solution}} and {{keyword}} (single focal object/scene). Keep background minimal, cool blue lighting, realistic industrial/corporate setting. No text/logos/watermarks. Negative: cartoon, blurry, low-res, readable text, logos.
prompt_templates.thumbnail: Create a minimalist thumbnail illustration. Size: 600x600 (1:1). Style: clean vector or semi-isometric icon, corporate tech. Central concept: {{category}} related to {{keyword}} and {{solution}}. Use brand colors subtly (navy/blue palette). Simple shapes, high contrast, no text, no logos, plain background. Negative: clutter, gradients too heavy, photorealistic faces, readable text, watermark.
